title: CLEMENCE, 1.50 CARAT 15 STONE STRAND NECKLACE, SILVER
description: The Clemence necklace features a delicate strand of 15 0.10-carat round-cut stones bezel-set in sterling silver. Adjustable by one inch for your preferred fit.
details:
Metal: Sterling silver
Setting: Bezel set
Stone Type: Lab-grown white sapphire
Stone Shape: Round cut
Closure: Spring ring
Chain Length: 16 inches or 17 inches
Includes loop to adjust necklace shorter by 1 inch



15 3MM stones, 1.50 CTW DEW

What is Lab-Grown?
